Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought him here to introduce him
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>You must be <MYNAME>. You live up to your
reputation! Youth is so wonderful.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Ah, sorry. I'm getting ahead of myself.
You just dazzled me with your
brilliance!
<PAGE>
<NAME_UNKOWN>I do tend to just come out and speak my
mind when I get frazzled. Don't pay me
any mind.
<PAGE>
<NAME_UNKOWN>
My name is <BLUE>Soseki</BLUE>. Nice to meet you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is a wonderful place. There's
no unnecessary noise. I think I'll be
very happy living here.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Work hard again today!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's all get along, shall we? See you
again soon.

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
